{{Description|Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.}}
'''Violet Arc''' is [[Lisa]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Holding this skill generates '''5''' [[Elemental Particle]]s when it hits at least 1 target. Pressing this skill does not generate any elemental particle.
* When the skill button is held, Lisa forms a big circle, and a small one that increases in size, both centered around Lisa. When the small one reaches the big one, Violet Arc Hold is ready to be released for full damage.
** This skill takes roughly '''1.9''' seconds to fully charge.
** Lisa can hold the skill for the maximum of '''4''' seconds. The skill is automatically released afterward.
* Holding the skill while there is no target still calls down several lightning bolts randomly, but those bolts do not apply {{Electro}} to nearby environment and are purely aesthetic.
* If the press ability triggers [[Superconduct]] or [[Overloaded]], it will apply 2 stacks of Conductive to the targets hit by the orb itself and 1 stack of Conductive to other targets hit by the reaction. Multiple reactions will apply stacks multiple times.
* Targets inflicted with Conductive will apply one stack in a small AoE around them separate from reactions.
* This ability will not apply any stacks of Conductive if Lisa is not the active character when the ability hits.
* Stacks remain on enemies for 15 seconds, and each stack applied keeps a separate timer.
* {{Talent Note|hitlag|the Conductive status}}
